name: YingXi - A Roguelike Chinese Shadow Play Game
name_original: YingXi - A Roguelike Chinese Shadow Play Game
description: YingXi firstly combine the rules of catching pieces in Go as the main gameplay. Players need to be familiar with the habits of different ghosts, know their next move and make the best decision to seal them all. There are a total of 20 distinctive levels in the game, including the final Boss Battle.
